verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, I am the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

After the \w doings|strong="H4639"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, wherein ye \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w*, shall ye not \w do|strong="H6213"\w*: and after the \w doings|strong="H4639"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*, whither I \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* you, shall ye not \w do|strong="H6213"\w*: neither shall ye \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in their \w ordinances|strong="H2708"\w*.

Ye shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w* my \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, and \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* mine \w ordinances|strong="H2708"\w*, to \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* therein: I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

Ye shall therefore \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* my \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*, and my \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*: \w which|strong="H0834"\w* if a \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*, he shall \w live|strong="H2425"\w* in them: I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ None of you shall \w approach|strong="H7126"\w* to \w any|strong="H0376"\w* that is \w near|strong="H7607"\w* of \w kin|strong="H1320"\w* to him, to \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* \add their\add* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*: I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 18.6 \ft near…: Heb. remainder of his flesh\f*

The \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* of thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, or the \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* of thy \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, shalt thou not \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w*: she \add is\add* thy \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*; thou shalt not \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* her \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*.

The \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* of thy \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* shalt thou not \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w*: it \add is\add* thy \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*.

The \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* of thy \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*, the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, or \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of thy \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, \add whether she be\add* \w born|strong="H4138"\w* at \w home|strong="H1004"\w*, or \w born|strong="H4138"\w* \w abroad|strong="H2351"\w*, \add even\add* their \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* thou shalt not \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w*.

The \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* of thy \w son’s|strong="H1121"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, or of thy \w daughter’s|strong="H1323"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, \add even\add* their \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* thou shalt not \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w*: for \w theirs|strong="H2007"\w* \add is\add* thine own \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*.

The \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* of thy \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w wife’s|strong="H0802"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, \w begotten|strong="H4138"\w* of thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, she \add is\add* thy \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*, thou shalt not \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* her \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*.

Thou shalt not \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* the \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* of thy \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*: she \add is\add* thy \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* near \w kinswoman|strong="H7607"\w*.

Thou shalt not \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* the \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* of thy \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*: for she \add is\add* thy \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* near \w kinswoman|strong="H7607"\w*.

Thou shalt not \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* the \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* of thy \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, thou shalt not \w approach|strong="H7126"\w* to his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*: she \add is\add* thine \w aunt|strong="H1733"\w*.

Thou shalt not \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* the \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* of thy daughter in \w law|strong="H3618"\w*: she \add is\add* thy \w son’s|strong="H1121"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*; thou shalt not \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* her \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*.

Thou shalt not \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* the \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* of thy \w brother’s|strong="H0251"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*: it \add is\add* thy \w brother’s|strong="H0251"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*.

Thou shalt not \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* the \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* of a \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* and her \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, neither shalt thou \w take|strong="H3947"\w* her \w son’s|strong="H1121"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, or her \w daughter’s|strong="H1323"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, to \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* her \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*; \add for\add* they \add are\add* her near \w kinswomen|strong="H7608"\w*: it \add is\add* \w wickedness|strong="H2154"\w*.

Neither shalt thou \w take|strong="H3947"\w* a \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* to her \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*, to \w vex|strong="H6887"\w* \add her\add*, to \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* her \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*, beside the other in her \w life|strong="H2416"\w* \add time\add*.\f + \fr 18.18 \ft a wife…: or, one wife to another\f*

Also thou shalt not \w approach|strong="H7126"\w* unto a \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* to \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* her \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*, as long as she is put \w apart|strong="H5079"\w* for her \w uncleanness|strong="H2932"\w*.

Moreover thou shalt \w not|strong="H5414"\w* \w lie|strong="H7903"\w* \w carnally|strong="H2233"\w* with thy \w neighbour’s|strong="H5997"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, to \w defile|strong="H2930"\w* thyself with her.

And thou shalt \w not|strong="H5414"\w* let any of thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* through \add the fire\add* to \w Molech|strong="H4432"\w*, neither shalt thou \w profane|strong="H2490"\w* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 18.21 \ft Molech: Gr. Moloch\f*
Thou shalt not \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* with \w mankind|strong="H2145"\w*, as \w with|strong="H4904"\w* \w womankind|strong="H0802"\w*: it \add is\add* \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w*.

Neither shalt \w thou|strong="H5414"\w* \w lie|strong="H7903"\w* with any \w beast|strong="H0929"\w* to \w defile|strong="H2930"\w* thyself therewith: neither shall any \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* a \w beast|strong="H0929"\w* to lie \w down|strong="H7250"\w* thereto: it \add is\add* \w confusion|strong="H8397"\w*.

\w Defile|strong="H2930"\w* not ye yourselves in any of these \w things|strong="H0428"\w*: for in all these the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* are \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* which I cast \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you:

And the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* is \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w*: therefore I do \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* the \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* thereof upon it, and the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* itself vomiteth \w out|strong="H6958"\w* her \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w*.

Ye shall therefore \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* my \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w* and my \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, and shall not \w commit|strong="H6213"\w* \add any\add* of these \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w*; \add neither\add* any of your own \w nation|strong="H0249"\w*, nor any \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* that \w sojourneth|strong="H1481"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* you:

(For all \w these|strong="H0411"\w* \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w* have the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, which \add were\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you, and the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* is \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w*;)

That the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* spue not you \w out|strong="H6958"\w* also, when ye \w defile|strong="H2930"\w* it, as it spued \w out|strong="H6958"\w* the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* that \add were\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you.

For whosoever shall \w commit|strong="H6213"\w* any of these \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w*, even the \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* that \w commit|strong="H6213"\w* \add them\add* shall be cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from \w among|strong="H7130"\w* their \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

Therefore shall ye \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* mine \w ordinance|strong="H4931"\w*, that \add ye\add* \w commit|strong="H6213"\w* not \add any one\add* of these \w abominable|strong="H8441"\w* \w customs|strong="H2708"\w*, which were \w committed|strong="H6213"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you, and that ye \w defile|strong="H2930"\w* not yourselves therein: I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.
